messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Song
messages.msgSnippet: Another great song is by John Mayer (CD is Room
messages.messageBody:
<Have any of you ever actually listened to the words of You Learn, by
Alanis Morissette?

Pretty cool.

Bridget>

Another great song is by John Mayer (CD is Room for Squares) No Such Thing.
Hes got a great website, too. www.johnmayer.com
<http://www.johnmayer.com/> . The first song you hear is the one Im talking
about. Its an unschoolers /break-out song if ever there was one!~

Sarah Carothers
puddles@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Song
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a tool for creating Alanis Morissette lyrics. http://www.brunching.com/toys/toy-alanislyrics.html Here s the intro. Don t you
messages.messageBody:
<< Alanis Morissette >>

Here's a tool for creating Alanis Morissette lyrics.

http://www.brunching.com/toys/toy-alanislyrics.html

Here's the intro.

Don't you just love Alanis Morissette? Doesn't her music just set your heart
afire with the passion of misspent youth? Don't you wish you could write
catchy pop hits just like she does?

Well now you can.

Simply fill out this form and our Alanis Morissette Random Lyric Generator
will spill out a #1 hit song that you can ride all the way to the bank! Go
on! Get miserable!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are three different options for songs.
It's really funny.

messages.subject: Song
messages.msgSnippet: Have any of you ever actually listened to the words of You Learn, by Alanis Morissette? Pretty cool. Bridget You Learn I recommend getting your heart trampled
messages.messageBody:
Have any of you ever actually listened to the words of You Learn, by
Alanis Morissette?

Pretty cool.

Bridget


You Learn

I recommend getting your heart trampled on to anyone
I recommend walking around naked in your living room
Swallow it down (what a jagged little pill)
It feels so good (swimming in your stomach)
Wait until the dust settles

You live you learn
You love you learn
You cry you learn
You lose you learn
You bleed you learn
You scream you learn

I recommend biting off more than you can chew to anyone
I certainly do
I recommend sticking your foot in your mouth at anytime
Feel free
Throw it down (the caution blocks you from the wind)
Hold it up (to the rays)
You wait and see when the smoke clears

You live you learn
You love you learn
You cry you learn
You lose you learn
You bleed you learn
You scream you learn

Wear it out (like a three-year-old would do)
Melt it down (you're gonna have to eventually anyway)
The fire trucks are coming up around the bend

You live you learn
You love you learn
You cry you learn
You lose you learn
You bleed you learn
You scream you learn

You grieve you learn
You choke you learn
You laugh you learn
You choose you learn
You pray you learn
You ask you learn
You live you learn
